install.name: Mon Youtube Video Module
install.author: Diwakar Kumar Singh
install.description: This module shows a Video image.

param.name: video_type
param.label: Select Type of Video You want to Play
param.description: If you select Youtube Video or Media Manager Video then enter whole path of video.If you select Component Video then enter Video ID bellow

param.name: id
param.label: video Path or ID
param.description: For Youtube Video or Media Manager Video please enter Video Path e.g. http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6WNt2GD5ufs and for Component Video Please enter Video ID

param.name: module_text
param.label: Module Type
param.description: Select to show which type of module you want to show
